title: Function
description: A stored database function that encapsulates reusable computation logic. Returns a value and can be used in SQL expressions for data transformation or validation.

language.description: Implementation language for the function body. 'SQL' and 'EXTERNAL' are SQL 2016 standard values; 'PLPGSQL', 'C', 'PYTHON', 'JAVASCRIPT' are vendor-specific extensions.

volatility.description: PostgreSQL-specific planner optimization hint. VOLATILE: function can modify database and return different results each call. STABLE: function returns consistent results within a single statement. IMMUTABLE: function cannot modify database and always returns same results for same inputs.

x-source-reference.description: Source code reference using OpenAPI x- extension pattern. This pattern is used for OpenAPI-style layers (API, Data Model, Datastore) to maintain compatibility with OpenAPI tooling, as opposed to the nested properties.source.reference pattern used in ArchiMate-style layers (Application, Technology).
